_comment: Example campaign brief in JSON format
_description: This brief defines a superhero-themed campaign for Japan market showcasing Superman experiencing Japanese culture
_campaign_id_comment: Unique identifier for this campaign - used to organize output files

products._product_id_comment: Must match the filename in input_assets/ (e.g., superman_tokyo_tower.png)
products.name: Superman at Tokyo Tower
products._name_comment: Product name used in GenAI prompts if image generation is needed
products.description: Superman flying majestically past Tokyo Tower at sunset, with Mount Fuji visible in the background, vibrant city lights beginning to glow, cinematic superhero style

products.name: Superman in Shibuya Crossing
products.description: Superman hovering above the famous Shibuya Crossing in Tokyo, neon signs and crowds below, dynamic urban superhero scene, evening atmosphere with colorful lights

_products_comment: List of products to process - each will get 3 aspect ratio variants (1:1, 9:16, 16:9)
_target_region_comment: Geographic market - influences GenAI image generation style and context
target_audience: anime and superhero fans aged 18-35 in Japan
_target_audience_comment: Audience description - used to inform GenAI image generation prompts
campaign_message: ヒーローが日本に来る！
_campaign_message_comment: Text that will be overlaid on all generated creative assets. Japanese text means 'The Hero Comes to Japan!'

localization._localization_comment: Optional: Specify language and region-specific messaging
